text.p: If we have an inner product on [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline], and vectors [mathjaxinline]v,w \in V[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]\langle v, w\rangle[/mathjaxinline] is...

optioninput.options: ('a scalar','a vector in V','a matrix','none of these')

font.p: The inner product of two vectors must be a scalar.
